review: The Malco HW8X1/2ZX Zip-in Screws are a fantastic addition to my toolkit. The quality is top-notch, with a sharp, tapered point that penetrates effortlessly into sheet metal and other materials. The hex washer slotted head ensures a secure fit and prevents stripping, making installation smooth and quick. Despite the slightly higher price, these screws offer excellent value for their durability and performance, making them a worthwhile investment for any DIY project or professional use.
